mapper.insert: INSERT INTO freeBoard(num, userId, userName, subject, content, hitCount, created, useridx) VALUES(#{num}, #{userId}, #{userName}, #{subject}, #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,0 ,SYSDATE ,#{useridx} )
INSERT INTO freeBoardFile(fileNum, num, saveFilename, originalFilename,fileSize) VALUES(freeBoardFile_seq.NEXTVAL, #{num}, #{saveFilename},#{originalFilename}, #{fileSize})
mapper.select:
SELECT f.num, f.userId, subject, hitCount, TO_CHAR(f.created,'YYYY-MM-DD') created, f.userName, NVL(replyCount,0) replyCount, NVL(fileCount, 0) fileCount FROM freeBoard f JOIN user1 u ON f.userIdx = u.userIdx LEFT OUTER JOIN( SELECT num, COUNT(*) fileCount FROM freeBoardFile GROUP BY num ) c ON f.num=c.num LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT num, COUNT(*) replyCount FROM freeBoardReply GROUP BY num ) r ON f.num = r.num
ORDER BY f.num DESC OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH FIRST #{rows} ROWS ONLY
SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) FROM freeBoard f JOIN user1 u ON f.userId = u.userId
mapper.update: UPDATE freeBoard SET hitCount=hitCount+1 WHERE num = #{num}
